alert.note: Alert for Ellis; Rush (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 12 at 9:48PM CST by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Rush and Ellis Counties through 1015 PM CST... At 948 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near La Crosse, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Liebenthal and Loretta around 1000 PM CST. Schoenchen, Pfeifer and Antonino around 1005 PM CST. Other locations in the path of this storm include Munjor, Hays, Victoria, Walker, Catherine and Toulon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
